sentences.sentence: With latkes and dreidels and plenty menorah where those came from!
sentences.translation: 以少胜多、以弱胜强…还有土豆烙饼胜大餐！

sentences.sentence: With latkes and dreidels and plenty menorah where those came from!
sentences.translation: 有土豆烙饼、陀螺和许多放那些东西的大烛台！

sentences.sentence: Most people dip the latkes in applesauce. I like mine with a lot of applesauce.
sentences.translation: 很多人都喜欢拿土豆饼沾苹果酱，我也喜欢吃的时候沾很多苹果酱。
